question: the us claimed that the al qaida hijackers had a book that said they should shave off their beards ,is this allowed in jihad
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to shave off the beard at any time including Jihaad. A Mujaahid may only dye his head beard black to make himself look young to his enemy.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
